void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord) {
    float scale = 0.25;
    float px = mod(fragCoord.x * scale + iTime * 15.0, SONIC_WIDTH);
    float py = mod(fragCoord.y * scale + iTime * 15.0, SONIC_HEIGHT);
    vec4 sonic = draw_sonic(px, py);
    
    vec3 color = mix(vec3(0.0, 0.5, 1.0), sonic.rgb, sonic.a);
    if(fract(fragCoord.y * scale * 0.5) < 0.5) {
        color *= 0.95;
    }

    fragColor.rgb = color;
    fragColor.a = 1.;
}
